book.note: A quotation from Deut 32:43 and Ps 97:7
Lit. "for the age of the age"

Lit. "not anyone of you be hardened"

book.note: Lit. "for we are also having had the good news proclaimed"
A quotation from Ps 95:7b-8 (see also Heb 3:7-8, 15)

book.note: Lit. "great for us the message and hard to explain to say"

book.note: This verse contains a number of quotations from Gen 14:17-19
